column9:
We went here on a Friday night on recommendation and decided to try their buffet. 
This was indeed a good choice as we were overwhelmed by the variety. 
Go for pre-cooked meals (all very fresh) from Chinese and Japanese cuisine or pick your vegetables, meat...More

Been several times with our teenagers and last time just before Christmas. We always goes with the weekend full buffet. You need to book a few days before. Varied buffet including sushi, asian dishes, wok made by your picked ingredients (meat, seafood, vegetables...) and dessert...More
Good value for money. There was a lot of choice available. However the tables are slightly cramped together. I would recommend trying to book a table in advance to get a better one.

Nice Asian buffet with a large selection of choices. A great place to go for binge eating! Perfect for families. It's very crowded sometimes though. In particular I enjoy the Mongolian Barbeque. Tables are very close to each other, but they also have a chambre...More

this is not a fine dining experiance. Still it serves a perfect simple concept for families. Tasty food, good price and many options.

To improve i would like to remove some optioms and focus on higher quality

Rosegarden is growing in popularity in Lund. Every evening Fridays and Saturdays  and lunchtime. Be there in time so you can get your table. If I'm not mistaken can't book a table by telephone or website. Otherwise a perfect place to enjoy some good food....More

We went to Rosegarden just around Christmas. We could not make a reservation and had to que in the rain. Just wanted to leave! Once entering this is a modern Asian restaurant which has organized things in an efficient manner. Athmosphere and decor is warm...More
Had the opportunity to visit Rosegarden and I was impressed with the quality of the food. Really fantastic taste and big servings too. I'll be back.
Perfect place if you love oriental food. And the choice of the buffet is amazing. It’s a busy place so one has to make a reservation. Will surely be back.
